reporter_caption.center: DELTA PAVING COMPANY v. WOOLDRIDGE, 249 La. 382 (1966)

caption.center: DELTA PAVING COMPANY v. ELMER WOOLDRIDGE, D/B/A WOOLDRIDGE CONSTRUCTION
COMPANY, RED BALL MOTOR FREIGHT, INC., RED BALL MOTOR FREIGHT SOUTHEAST,
INC., AND ENGLISH REALTY CO., INC.

opinion.posture: IN RE: DELTA PAVING COMPANY APPLYING FOR WRITS OF CERTIORARI, PROHIBITION AND MANDAMUS.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] Writs denied. The ruling of the Court of Appeal denying to applicant writs in this case is correct.
